alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 08 at 3:04AM PDT until May 09 at 2:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds increasing to 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 65 mph this afternoon and evening. Localized wind gusts in excess of 75 mph in the most wind prone areas. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains, San Diego County Mountains, Apple and Lucerne Valleys, Coachella Valley, San Diego County Deserts and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...Winds increasing this morning with the strongest, most damaging winds surfacing this afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing sand will reduce visibilities in the deserts. Strong crosswinds will make driving difficult.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.
